pkgmetadata.longdescription: Approximation of the Shapley Values Based on Experimental Designs // Estimating the Shapley values using the algorithm in the paper Liuqing Yang, Yongdao Zhou, Haoda Fu, Min-Qian Liu and Wei Zheng (2024) doi:10.1080/01621459.2023.2257364 "Fast Approximation of the Shapley Values Based on Order-of-Addition Experimental Designs". You provide the data and define the value function, it retures the estimated Shapley values based on sampling methods or experimental designs.
